title: Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: K. 9/30/33, LUCE 10/17/33/COMB #1.-BRAZILIAN ROSEWOOD TOPS/GUM POSTS & SIDES & FRONTS-OAK INTERIOR/COMB #2. WALNUT COMB./FRONT & SIDES-STRAIGHT CIRCASSIAN WALNUT STRIPE-/TOPS & BANDING- AMERICAN WALNUT-STAINED DARK BROWN-ALMOST BLACK-OAK INTERIOR; inscribed in red color pencil at upper right: DIN-A2; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; lower right in graphite: SCALE 1"-1'0"/7500 [circled]; inscribed dimensions; erased inscriptions at upper left
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for sideboard with two variations of materials. Long, rectangular sideboard with top in darker wood, body in lighter wood. Four drawers in body of sideboard with horizontal pulls; four straight, tapered legs with banding in darker wood.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-916.
